ED_Title: Comprehensive  implementation of and follow-up to the Vienna Declaration and Programme of Action
ED_DecisionText: At its 46th plenary meeting, on 16 December 2020, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Third Committee (A/75/478/Add.4).
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
